Values.11: A new World War shall wipe out all life on Earth
Values.12: A FIST agent shall die, so we all may live forever
Values.13: All shall fail, all shall burn
Values.14: All dead shall once again seize life
Values.15: All kingdoms shall be swept away by storms
Values.16: All shall be forgiven in the Violet Sunrise
Values.21: All witches shall be purged in flame
Values.22: God is alive, worry not; we shall kill Him
Values.23: God is dead, worry not; He is to be resurrected
Values.24: God is missing, worry not; we shall find Him
Values.25: God shall walk with us as man
Values.26: Math is wrong! We shall make it right
Values.31: One day, all of mankind shall share a single mind
Values.32: Our blessed food shall be eaten by every mouth
Values.33: Our leader shall molt and hatch into a god
Values.34: Our message shall fill the minds of millions
Values.36: The Old Kingdom shall rise and sunder the new
Values.41: The aliens that built this world shall return
Values.42: The animals shall inherit the earth
Values.43: The blood we spill shall feed our children
Values.44: The city is the forge where we shall build God
Values.45: The old mountain giants shall break free
Values.46: The solstice shall bring us new bodies
Values.51: The stars shall fall until none remain
Values.52: The world is just fine as is. We shall stop alterations
Values.53: We shall cure every mind of sickness
Values.55: We shall mold a better world from the ashes
Values.56: We shall replace the false rulers with our own
Values.61: We shall scourge every evil soul from this world
Values.62: We shall seize Heaven and pull it down to Earth
Values.63: We shall spread our holy parasite to every heart
Values.64: We shall travel to other worlds
Values.65: When the stars are right, the Crawling Lord rises
Values.66: When we perish, we shall be born anew
